getRealRoots

public static double[] getRealRoots(double[] coeffs,
                                    int deg)
Gets an array containing all real roots including duplicates, sorted smallest to largest

Parameters:
coeffs - the coefficients of the polynomial in increasing order of powers of x
deg - the degree of the polynomial
Returns:
a sorted array of doubles containing all real roots of the polynomial

getRealRootsWithMultiplicities

public static Roots.RootFactor[] getRealRootsWithMultiplicities(double[] a,
                                                                int deg)
Returns the real roots with multiplicities.

Parameters:
a - is the polynomial in the form a[0]x^n + ... + a[n]
deg - is the degree
Returns:
an array of linear RootFactors sorted smallest to largest
